name: Triple Envelope Filter
description: An envelope filter that uses three filters instead of one to create more interesting and exotic tones that mimic the vocal track.
left-pot-function: Attack speed of the envelope filter
center-pot-function: How far the filters sweep when a note is played
youtube-url: optional, add a URL to a youtube video
soundcloud-url: optional, add a URL to a soundcloud audio clip
creator: your alias
